name: logix-monorepo
description: LogiX 项目 Lint 配置

scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:md
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend && npm run lint:fix:md
scripts.lint:naming: npm run lint:naming:backend && npm run lint:naming:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend && npm run format:md
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:frontend
scripts.validate: npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run lint:naming
